TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ilausan, title = Ilausan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ilausan} }

S.FORM: == Ilausan == u sulit nu Hulam: 依勞善部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Nantou a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Ilausan. u kasalumaluma' nu Ilausan sa, 110 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 392 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 266 ku tademaw, pakalatu 68%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 126 ku tademaw, pakalatu 32%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 67%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Puyuma 1%. u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) u Tayal a niyazu' kuyni. u Yuwatan(Bunun) sananay, cayay katalakaw ku uzip, kizumu ku uzip, mabana miadupay a cidekay. u Incumin a tademaw tu, u Bunun a cidekay kaduut ku tademaw. u zuma a tademaw sa u Tayan atu Puyuma. inayi' tu ku zuma cidekay a tademaw mueneng itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Ilaosan == o solit no Holam: 依勞善部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Nantoo a kowan ko niyazo' no Ilaosan. o kasalomaloma' no Ilaosan sa, 110 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 392 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 266 ko tademaw, pakalato 68%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 126 ko tademaw, pakalato 32%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 67%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Poyoma 1%. o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) o Tayal a niyazo' koyni. o Yowatan(Bonon) sananay, cayay katalakaw ko ozip, kizomo ko ozip, mabana miadopay a cidekay. o Incomin a tademaw to, o Bonon a cidekay kadoot ko tademaw. o zoma a tademaw sa o Tayan ato Poyoma. inayi' to ko zoma cidekay a tademaw moeneng itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
